author: marvin
msg: LUCY-169 Clean up better after MSVC.
Clean up .pdb files.  (This commit is distinct to the 0.1 branch, as in svn
trunk the cleanup happens via Makefiles).

author: norman
msg: Allow to enable/disable BlobMessage usage and add osgi meta-data to mailetcontainer-camel. See JAMES-835

author: marvin
msg: LUCY-169 Clean up better after MSVC.
ExtUtils::CBuilder tends to leave a lot of extra files around when working
with MSVC.  When working with CBuilder directly (as opposed to relying on
Module::Build to manage CBuilder), you have to clean up these files manually.
